DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety reactogenicity GSK Biologicals ' Diphtheria Tetanus acellular Pertussis/Haemophilus influenzae type b vaccine give Chinese infant 3 , 4 5 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety & Reactogenicity GSK Biologicals ' DTPa/Hib Vaccine When Given 3 , 4 5 Months Age
DOC.criteria: A male female , include , 90 120 day age time first vaccination Written inform consent obtain parent guardian subject subject know exposure diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis and/or Haemophilus influenzae disease participate , subject receive previous vaccination diphtheria , tetanus , acellular pertussis and/or Haemophilus influenzae type b ( Hib ) diseases participate .
